title: Ep 40 | Phil Stumps Alexa, Challenge of the Hunt, and the Birth of Christ Is Bigger Than You Think
description:
Phil stumps Alexa with a question about who the world counts time by. Duck season has been off to a slow start, but Phil puts in a request with the Almighty to bring some their way. Christ being born is an amazing thing to celebrate, but that’s only the beginning of the story. It gets even better!

Save $20 OFF a BlazeTv subscription between now and Christmas when you use offer code Phil20OFF -- Sign up at https://www.blazetv.com/phil
